meanings.definition: A sauce made of butter, egg yolks, and lemon juice.
meanings.sent1: I love to drizzle hollandaises on my eggs for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a delicious hollandaises to accompany the asparagus.
meanings.sent3: The hollandaises danced on the plate, tempting my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The hollandaises was a smooth river of flavor flowing over the dish.
meanings.sent5: The hollandaises added a creamy richness to the dish.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to Holland or its people.
meanings.sent1: The tulips in the garden had a hollandaises charm.
meanings.sent2: She wore a traditional hollandaises costume for the festival.
meanings.sent3: The windmill spun with a hollandaises grace in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The painting captured the hollandaises spirit of the countryside.
meanings.sent5: The wooden shoes had a hollandaises touch to them.
